parameters.name: prestime
parameters.description: Presentation time for each word (in ms)

parameters.name: numlists
parameters.description: Number of lists to use (max is the number of lists in drm-words.csv

parameters.name: samplelists
parameters.description: Whether lists should be sampled if numlist is shorter than 24.  If 0, it will choose them in order of the file, but shuffle them for presentation.

parameters.name: doratings
parameters.description: Whether pleasantness ratings should be used, instead of time-based presentation.
